original_title: Tommy Shaw and the Contemporary Youth Orchestra - Sing For The Day
overview: Sing For The Day! showcases Styx guitarist/vocalist Tommy Shaw's rousing 2016 solo turn with the Cleveland-based Contemporary Youth Orchestra. Shaw also celebrates the 10th anniversary of Styx's triumphant 2006 One With Everything performance with the CYO. From the Waetjen Auditorium in Cleveland, Ohio.
title: Tommy Shaw and the Contemporary Youth Orchestra - Sing For The Day
